thread.title: What Gerald Anderson loves most about Bea Alonzo
thread.title_full: What Gerald Anderson loves most about Bea Alonzo

title: What Gerald Anderson loves most about Bea Alonzo
text:
What Gerald Anderson loves most about Bea Alonzo By Deni Rose M. Afinidad-Bernardo (philstar.com) | Updated February 14, 2017 - 3:28pm #TeamBearald: Bea Alonzo and Gerald Anderson Instagram/Bearald.Universe 
MANILA, Philippines — Love songs fill the running playlist of actor and athlete Gerald Anderson. His girlfriend, actress Bea Alonzo, also runs 5k. 
“She’s very strong,” Gerald said of his lady love. 
Unfortunately, the lovebirds are not together this Valentine’s since Gerald has to work in Bacolod, but he assured his fans that he and Bea are there to support each other. 
According to him, the two of them became a couple after touring the world together for their various projects for ABS-CBN. From the United States, to Canada and Belize, the two bonded after their shows and from there, they fell in love with each other. 
“In spite her stature and achievements, when you get to know her as a person, she is really so poised and refined. She’s really a princess inside,” Gerald told Philstar.com of why he loves his girlfriend so much. 
The Kapamilya actor can be seen with ex-girlfriend Kim Chiu and good friend Jake Cuenca in the upcoming soap opera, “Ikaw Lang ang Iibigin.”
